expo.name: Caramelo Pets
expo.description: Organize a vida dos seus pets com facilidade! Gerencie perfis, agende lembretes de vacinas e consultas, e acompanhe o crescimento dos seus amigos de quatro patas.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Caramelo Pets uses the camera to capture photos inside the app before you publish them.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Caramelo Pets accesses your photo library to let you choose media that appears in the app.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Caramelo Pets needs access to your calendar to add care reminders and appointments for your pets.

plugins.calendarPermission: Caramelo Pets needs access to your calendar to add care reminders and appointments for your pets.
